one of the first things you probably want to do after setting up basic things like version control and so on it's
figuring out how to actually run your application locally so you can fire up a web browser and hit the endpoint if it's
a web app testing to make sure things work properly and then going back to your code making changes and then
iterating so in other words an inner development loop and since you since
we're running our code eventually in kubernetes cluster it's probably pretty important that your local development
environment mirror production as closely as possible so you can catch bugs early and this means running inside of an
